amendment.description: Amendment modifies the Commodity Exchange Act to give the Commodity Futures Trading Commission authority to designate other agencies to manage its leases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-3 to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to give the Commodity Futures Trading Commission authority to designate other agencies to manage its leases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Aderholt amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Aderholt amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Aderholt.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
